The gamer will have at his disposal explosives and a sledgehammer for destroying all kinds of surfaces to penetrate the territory, as well as several types of vehicles of different sizes for loading valuables and other things that need to be stolen according to the terms of a particular task.

item.title: Stacklands
item.description: Game Description InStacklands you have to build a village, completing various levels in the style of a deck-building battler. Users will collect food, build buildings and fight monsters on a special field using ability cards. It will be possible to use combinations of cards. For example, when you move a “village dweller” to a “berry bush”, “berries” will appear, which the city dweller will consume as food and get a chance to survive.

item.title: Total War: WARHAMMER 3
item.description: Game Description GameplayTotal War: WARHAMMER 3 is a mixture of turn-based strategy and RTS. It is necessary to gather an army and move it around the global map, capturing all areas. By extracting resources and recruiting units, you will need to create settlements. You can enter into diplomacy with different factions, enter into alliances with them, or declare war. The economic part of Total War: Warhammer 3 is presented by TBS mechanics, while battles take place in real time.

item.title: Noble Fates
item.description: Game Description The fantasy world of Noble Fates immerses you in adventures taking place in a fairy-tale kingdom. A group of gods oversee the plane of human material existence while mortals vie for control over territories and new lands. The main character is Contra, who is a demigod and capable of influencing people and other inhabitants of the planet. It will be possible to manage entire colonies of settlers in order to achieve prosperity for the future great civilization.

item.title: Inscryption
item.description: Game Description Inscryption is a card adventure with roguelike elements that focuses on the fact that the darkness still hides many unknown secrets. The strategy is made in an escape the room format, has multiple puzzles and a terrifying atmosphere. The user is transported to the goblin’s hut, where he needs to embark on dangerous adventures to find out what secrets are hidden in this building. The events take place in a forest house, where the protagonist is trapped by some sinister creature who wants the guy to play board games with him.

item.title: The Riftbreaker
item.description: Game Description The Riftbreaker is a survival adventure role-playing game that has some mechanics taken straight from real-time strategy and action games. The project has dynamic gameplay, using an isometric camera to create the most convenient and complete view around the female protagonist named Ashley Novak. She has a powerful invention of mankind - a combat mech named “Mr. Riggs”, which helps to most effectively fight the various monsters that inhabit the planet Galatea-37, where the single-player campaign takes place, designed for dozens of hours of gameplay.

item.title: Erannorth Chronicles
item.description: Game Description Erannorth Chronicles combines an RPG and a card game. It’s also a sandbox. There is no complete single plot here. The indie title invites users to entertain themselves: explore the open world, fight monsters, upgrade their character, and participate in random events. You can also go treasure hunting or take tests. This CCG has a high barrier to entry due to the large number of deep mechanics that gamers have to figure out for themselves.

item.title: Cookie Clicker
item.description: Game Description Cookie Clicker lives up to its name. This is a clicker about earning cookies. The title is considered one of the first such games. The project developed and popularized an entire genre. Initially it was a browser. Here is an improved version of Cookie Clicker. The re-release boasts an achievement system with 500 achievements, 600 improvements, the ability to exchange some goodies for others, and receiving constant upgrades. There are also mini-games here.

item.title: Rise Eterna
item.description: Game Description The story of Rise Eterna follows Lua as she attempts to uncover the secrets of her own origins. The gameplay combines tactical elements and RPG in a Japanese animated style. The user will assemble a squad of characters with special skills and characteristics. A squad can have up to 14 wards. The heroes will go through brutal battles, dungeons and boss encounters. As the player progresses, he discovers a dark and mature story centered around the relationship between two lost souls.

item.title: Demeo
item.description: Game Description Dark fantasy in Demeo plunges a party of adventurers into dangerous adventures where they have to fight against monsters. The game is made in the form of a role-playing turn-based adventure game, which you can play using virtual reality glasses. The project combines the dungeon crawler genre and tactical strategy, allowing you to take turns on the field and clear locations from opponents. Gamers will extract loot from enemies and strengthen their characters with found artifacts and things.

item.title: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
item.description: Game Description Totally Accurate Battle Simulator is a crazy tactical war game, heavily tied to physics. The battles take place in real time using weapons from different eras. The game is built on the laws of physics, so you can witness the most incredible combat in the history of video games! One of the main features of the game is its caricature and the creation of the most insane atmosphere of battles.

item.title: Dyson Sphere Program
item.description: Game Description Dyson Sphere Program is a space simulator that allows you to develop your base and explore the galaxy. Go into the vastness of outer space to colonize distant planets. Build an intergalactic factory using the power of the stars. Design and plan production chains. Collect resources and develop your base. Start your journey as a small workshop and progress to the Dyson Sphere - a megastructure that orbits the stars.

item.title: Founders' Fortune
item.description: Game Description Founders' Fortune is a fantasy sim where, in addition to building and defending a base, you need to monitor the psychological state of the heroes. The colonists reach the island empty-handed to settle in a new place. By collecting resources, they build houses and various objects. Construction begins with walls and floors, after which furniture is placed and the façade is put in order. Colonists are the main element of Founders' Fortune.

item.title: Bridge Constructor: The Walking Dead
item.description: Game Description Bridge Constructor: The Walking Dead is a collaboration between two famous franchises. “The Walking Dead” is a famous series based on a comic book, “Bridge Builder” is an arcade simulator of a construction worker using ragdoll animation and a realistic physical model that follows the laws of the real world. The gamer will have to join a group of survivors in a universe where an apocalypse has occurred due to the appearance of zombies due to an unknown disease.

item.title: Stirring Abyss
item.description: Game Description Stirring Abyss is a turn-based strategy with role-playing game elements. Uncover the ancient secrets of the undersea depths in a twisted and mystical story inspired by the works of famous writer Howard Phillips Lovecraft. The main character is the captain of the surviving underwater crew of the submarine Salem. The shipwreck occurred during the Cold War. The soldiers survived, but found themselves at the ruins of an extinct civilization.

item.title: Neighbors back from Hell
item.description: Game Description Neighbors back From Hell is a re-release of the famous adventure puzzle game with charismatic main characters. The player takes on the role of a young guy named Woody, who was unable to make friends with his grumpy neighbor in an apartment building. To teach the evil man a lesson, the protagonist organizes the filming of the TV show “Neighbors from Hell,” which was continued for a second season.

item.title: Squad
item.description: Game Description Squad is a military tactical first person shooter game. This is a multiplayer game with an emphasis on realism. An important role is assigned to team interaction between users. This project does not have a story campaign or single player modes. Instead, players in it capture points, destroy weapons depots, or hold the defense. The title was originally called Project Reality. This was a modification for the second “Battle”.

item.title: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos
item.description: Game Description The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos is a humorous adventure set in the Naheulbeuk Universe. John Lang wrote a comedy series based on role-playing game parodies and heroic adventures. The developers decided to create a game based on the author’s universe. In a dungeon set in a fantasy setting, clumsy characters try to get their hands on treasure. The RPG has complex tactical elements, with a dose of humor, unexpected surprises and ridiculous encounters.

item.title: Crusader Kings 3
item.description: Game Description Crusader Kings 3 is a global strategy that significantly expands the capabilities of the previous part. Crusader Kings 3 covers the time period from 1066 to 1453. Unlike the second part, you won’t be able to start the game at any time. The new map stretches from Spain to Burma and Mongolia, and from Scandinavia to Central Africa. The scale of the game is quadrupled. The points on the map represent not only counties, but also baronial possessions.

item.title: Factorio
item.description: Game Description The new planet should have everything to provide people with a comfortable, peaceful existence. Factorio is a sandbox in 2D graphics, where a new planet should be fully equipped for the future life of people. As soon as we arrive in a new place, we need to extract resources, assemble elements from them, and build structures so that people in the future can settle in and exist peacefully. Don’t forget that the planet reacts aggressively to colonizers.

item.title: The Battle of Polytopia
item.description: Game Description The Battle of Polytopia is a turn-based strategy game with city builder elements. The events of the game develop in the fictional world of Square. There are 12 factions to choose from, one of which you can start a campaign for. Lead your people to world domination by expanding your sphere of influence and exploring new technologies. You will explore the surrounding lands, develop various technologies and collect useful materials, on the basis of which your base will develop.

item.title: Persona 4 Golden
item.description: Game Description Persona 4 Golden is a role-playing game about a group of friends who are able to summon demons from the other world. To do this, it is enough to shoot yourself in the temple. The events take place in the small Japanese town of Inaba. The children in Persona 4 are teenagers going through puberty. The heroes are investigating a mysterious series of murders. The gameplay of Persona 4 Golden contains elements of a visual novel.

item.title: Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal
item.description: Game Description Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal - Pacific War Naval Warfare dives into the air conflicts that unfolded in the Pacific during World War II. This strategy game puts you in the middle of the historical battles between the US and Japan in 1942-1943. Using a system of hexes and counters, the title tasks you with outflanking your opponent while defending critical areas or attacking key enemy positions. It’s all about decision making: when to strike, when to retreat, how to preserve your carriers and prevent the enemy from gaining a foothold.

item.title: Plutocracy
item.description: Game Description Plutocracy is a strategy in which you will be transported to the Golden Age, to the time when the first rich people of the United States of America just appeared. The gameplay will begin in 1870 and continue until the present day. During this gap, you will need to buy out many companies and put your name on the highest line of the board. You will start from scratch and will earn and work to become a shadow ruler.

item.title: Railroad Corporation
item.description: Game Description Railroad Corporation is a railway construction simulator. You have to build your own empire from numerous freight and passenger routes. The game takes place in North America in the 19th century. The gamer will have to master the road to new lands. The player needs to establish friendly relations with various foreign enterprises. Build your own factories and populate residential buildings. From the very beginning you will only have a small amount of money.

item.title: Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition is a re-release of the classic real-time strategy game released in 1999 under the name “The Age of Kings”. The game is famous for the fact that the player develops his civilization from the Stone Age to the Modern Age. The gameplay is based on the fact that it is necessary to hire peasants, gather troops, erect buildings, study maps, develop the era and explore new capabilities, technologies and, most importantly, destroy the enemy.

item.title: Little Big Workshop
item.description: Game Description Little Big Workshop is a meditation game with calm, measured gameplay. The passage begins very strangely, someone left a game with figures of little human workers on his desktop. And this someone begins to fantasize that these little men come to life, and work is in full swing in their toy workshop. It is the fantasies of the mysterious protagonist that gamers will have to watch. The strategy will not give the player time to rest, because orders will immediately begin to arrive, and the virtual phone will be ringing off the hook with constant calls to it.

item.title: Oxygen Not Included
item.description: Game Description The player’s task inOxygen Not Included is to obtain food, water, oxygen, valuable resources and happiness for the duplicates - the inhabitants of his colony. The world settled into different parts, because of this, half of the people went to other planets, and the second part called themselves duplicates and decided to travel through space, flying between asteroids. The idea of ​​the most hardcore survival simulator in a strategic shell - Oxygen Not Included - shows that maintaining your own base and several people on it is incredibly difficult.

item.title: Interstellar Space: Genesis
item.description: Game Description Interstellar Space: Genesis is a turn-based strategy on a global map that uses the popular setting of outer space in an alternative universe where the distant future has arrived. The world is inhabited by various races that have their own history, advantages over others and disadvantages that they try to hide. Before starting a new save, the player is given a choice of 6 available factions. There is functionality that makes it possible to create a unique state for governance.

item.title: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS
item.description: Game Description Total War: THREE KINGDOMS is the first game in the series that recreates epic conflicts in Ancient China. The game combines a turn-based campaign of empire building and conquest with epic real-time battles. 190 AD. A beautiful but fragmented country awaits a new emperor and a new life. The player will have to unify China, create the next great dynasty and leave a legacy that will endure for millennia.

item.title: Baba Is You
item.description: Game Description Baba Is You is a game in the popular puzzle genre. The project, developed by indie programmer Hempuli Oi, uses pixel graphics and a camera positioned high above, which creates conditions for greater visibility around the protagonist for faster response to changes. The single-player campaign is divided into 200 separate levels with increasing difficulty, introducing much more intricate puzzles on the way to the final scene, and the use of new mechanics.

item.title: Space Engineers
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofSpace Engineers is that you will build space stations, ships, and begin to study neighboring planets and passing asteroids, where you will find many useful resources. Control is carried out from the perspective of a person, a ship, a base, a flying station, and you can change the camera view from both the third and first person. When you create a world, the game automatically generates a random sequence of planets on which you can find valuable resources.

item.title: Slay the Spire
item.description: Game Description InSlay the Spire the main task of the gamer is to climb to the upper levels of a tower consisting of many rooms. During the passage, you can have one of 4 characters, collect a collection of cards, defeat intermediate enemies and defeat the main villain. The locations and forks of the tower are constantly changing, the whole process can be divided into three acts and at the end of each of them the main character must defeat the local boss.

item.title: Penkura
item.description: Game Description Penkura combines several genres: action, adventure, RPG and strategy. Gamers find themselves in a unique world where they have to survive and thrive in an alien environment. The title begins with users traveling through an ancient singularity and landing on the distant world of Karenos. Here they will have to collect resources, explore ancient ruins and build a base that will help them cope with the upcoming trials. The combination of different gameplay styles creates an atmosphere that requires strategic thinking and adaptation at every turn.

item.title: Bloons TD 6
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 6 (Bloons Tower Defense 6) is a 2018 action strategy game where the player will have to defend a fortress with the help of monkeys. The goal of the game is to destroy a stream of fast-moving balloons. The fewer goals missed, the greater the chances of winning. The balls differ in appearance and characteristics - new ones have been added in this part: purple, reinforced and impenetrable.

item.title: Kingdom Two Crows
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Two Crowns is a cooperative microstrategy that tells about the brave, who has become a king and now he needs to gather his army. Having saddled the right horse, he goes on a long journey to expand the kingdom. He will be opposed by the army of greed, trying to take everything from him that he has set up with his own labor. The game offers to rush not only in European medieval landscapes, but also to see many radically new ones.

item.title: Kenshi
item.description: Game Description Kenshi forces you to survive from the very first minutes of the game. An impressive RPG with an open world and the ability to create your own squad, the remaining player privileges are gradually revealed to us. For example, you can build your own buildings in any location, conquer them from other factions, create your own business, sell goods in peaceful settlements, craft whatever you want, explore the environment and do whatever you want.

item.title: RimWorld
item.description: Game Description A simulator of city planning and strategic base development on a planet unknown to the player. The player inRimWorld must build a base where the last forces of people are concentrated. To survive, get food, study the technology tree and understand what the planet wants from you is the main task of the player. The project itself is characterized by the enormous depth of built mechanics that you can apply to your buildings and the base as a whole.

item.title: Airships: Conquer the Skies
item.description: Game Description Airships: Conquer the Skies (2018) is a multiplayer sandbox indie action and strategy game developed by David Stark under his own publishing house for various platforms, including PC. Airships has extremely positive reviews on various resources. The game is truly loved by gamers from all over the world. So what will you have to do? Build pixelated skyships in steampunk style! The buildings are shown in cross-section and from the side, and their modules are controlled by crew members.

item.title: Football, Tactics & Glory
item.description: Game Description Football, Tactics & Glory is a football team management simulator with strategy elements. As a coach, the player will need to identify the weaknesses and strengths of his opponent in order to identify unique tactics. With the help of a well-chosen strategy, you can defeat even a stronger opponent. Each match is like a puzzle where you need to find the key that helps you win. Each athlete on the field is a unique character, and you can even develop a relationship with each of them.

item.title: Just Shapes & Beats
item.description: Game Description Just Shapes & Beats offers gameplay based on the sound of music and beats. The difficulty level of the game depends on the rhythm of the soundtrack. The user takes control of a blue square; Many difficulties await him ahead. In the process, the hero is helped by friends, with whom he fights enemies. The game supports online and local co-op with 4 players in Story Mode and Challenge Runs.

item.title: Conan Exiles
item.description: Game Description Conan Exiles is an amazing multiplayer survival game with RPG and action elements. Employees of the Norwegian company Funcom worked on the project. The project was released at the end of spring 2018. Stunning graphics are a rare quality that developers of various MMORPG games pay attention to. But this time everything happened exactly the opposite. Funcom, 10 years before Conan Exiles, had already released a similar game called Age Of Conan.

item.title: Frostpunk
item.description: Game Description Frostpunk is an economic strategy game, a simulator of city construction in extremely harsh climatic conditions, where there are no wars, but there is a main enemy in the form of global cooling. The employees of the main office of 11 bit studios worked on the creation of this project. The official release of the game took place in April 2018. In technical terms, we have a three-dimensional strategy game, with a top-down view, a simulator of the leader of a surviving human population in the Arctic cold.

item.title: Bridge Constructor Portal
item.description: Game Description The Bridge Constructor Portal project was made into one big puzzle. We play as an employee of the Portal Nature Research Laboratory. Having a constructor under our control, we will build bridges, ramps and other objects in 60 different levels. Each built bridge will help the little men achieve a result - exiting a level to move to another, so Bridge Constructor Portal perfectly combines logical planning and tactical construction of levels.

item.title: Cogmind
item.description: Game Description Cogmind is a sci-fi roguelike in which you play as a robot assembled from components of other machines. Cogmind combat is presented in a turn-based style. You can explore the big world, hack devices, quietly sneak into strategic places, or act directly and attack your opponents head-on. The gameplay does not limit you to actions. Play the way you want. Your task is to assemble yourself from various modules.

item.title: Middle-earth: Shadow of War - Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description The action takes place in the fictional world of the writer Tolkien. The Middle Lands are full of adventures for our player, so the plot unfolds from half of them. Events introduce us to the continuation of the previous part. Talion and Celebrimbor forge a new ring, which Sauron does not know about - he will not be able to influence it. The new ring carries with it another responsibility: inMiddle-earth: Shadow of War, Celebrimbor loses his freedom in exchange for a new One Ring.

item.title: Stick Fight: The Game
item.description: Game Description Stick Fight: The Game is a multiplayer platformer with fighting game elements. Players control colorful people, overcoming obstacles and fighting each other. The main gameplay consists of moving, jumping and reacting quickly. On the path of the heroes there will be deadly obstacles that will take the lives of all those who hesitated even a little and did not react to the situation. Game features: from 2 to 4 players over a local or online network; physics-based combat system; about 100 well-developed and detailed locations; includes a level editor; various ranged and melee weapons; procedurally generated and contextual animations based on the system Totally Accurate Battle Simulator.

item.title: Total War: WARHAMMER 2
item.description: Game Description Total War: WARHAMMER 2 is a turn-based strategy that invites you to immerse yourself in the gloomy campaign of the New World. The gameplay is highlighted by large-scale battles between six races. Enter the battlefield to save or destroy the world. Total War Warhammer 2 consists of two parts: a turn-based campaign in the open world and tactical battles in real time. Play both in single mode and take part in multiplayer battles.

item.title: Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description In this game, elves and other heroes gather in one flock. InDivinity: Original Sin 2 - Definitive Edition even Rivellon has undergone significant changes. The developers completely remade the entire game. No one knows where to start. The graphics in the game became more like realistic ones for some other world. There is nothing superfluous on the screen, and procasts, magical effects and the death of other heroes look better.

item.title: The Long Dark
item.description: Game Description A game about survival in a world without electricity. The Long Dark is eternal darkness in locations, gorgeous graphics from developers who love the sky and stars as their second home. Players were pleased that the entire gameplay is divided into two modes. The first is a story-based passage of 5 episodes, the total duration of which is 60-70 hours, depending on how the plot is followed. The second mode is survival in an excellent open world, where you will have to keep an eye on the contents of your backpack, check for items, collect skins, fry meat, take refuge in shelters, furnish your own house or a small corner in a house for survivors, where the owner of this establishment will shelter you.

item.title: Ravenfield
item.description: Game Description The team-tactical shooterRavenfield will allow you to plunge into furious battles, where you have everything - from tanks to fleets. There is a complete lack of storyline and even multiplayer. The latter fact is extremely unusual for projects of this genre. It would seem that it is interesting to play against bots and when there are no real users on the map. This omission at first glance is more than compensated for by a fairly developed artificial intelligence - opponents and allies behave extremely intelligently and together with them you can perform a variety of tactics using numerous commands and options.

item.title: Little Nightmares
item.description: Game Description Little Six is ​​a girl who was brought on board the ship as a servant. She, like many nomes - the characters of the game - hides her face for unknown reasons. In the game we have to get out from the lowest sector to the upper decks, but the levels will not immediately allow us to do this. First, the player needs to know that sinister hands will always hunt for us.

item.title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands
item.description: Game Description The open world of the new part -Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands - truly inspires what the developers tried to convict all players of. It must be said, but there is no plot in a third-person shooter. You independently write the story of your team, which is initially aimed at destroying the cartel that trades and produces drugs. But more on that later. First, it’s worth discussing the inner world of Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands.

item.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
item.description: Game Description Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun is a tactical stealth action game set in the Japanese Edo era (1603-1868). A conspiracy led by Kage-sama is carried out against the new shogun, after he was able to unite the lands of Japan. In order not to destroy the world, the ruler instructs his henchman samurai named Mugen to track down Kage-sama and his organization. For these purposes, the hero enlists the support of four companions - masters of secrecy and penetration.

item.title: Sid Meiers Civilization 6
item.description: Game Description A turn-based strategy from famous developers -Sid Meier’s Civilization VI, where the player’s main goal is to develop his own settlement from a small group of people. They build cities, become diplomats, politicians, officials, and make scientific achievements. The population of your city, and then the state, is gradually increasing, and you are moving towards capturing the land around you. Together with allies or alone, you fight against opponents controlled by artificial intelligence.

item.title: Stellar Tactics
item.description: Game Description Stellar Tactics is an exciting journey through the unknown expanses of space. This game combines mechanics from a variety of genres, for example, from group tactical turn-based strategies or exploratory adventure games. The player is offered the role of a discoverer of many star systems that remained untouched during the colonization of space. There are 160,000 universes with their own stars and varying numbers of planets in them. The player always chooses what he wants to do - story missions or side activities that are not required to be mastered.

item.title: Niche - a genetics survival game
item.description: Game Description Genetic survival game Niche - a genetics survival game will allow you to deal with the population of special foxes. To survive, you need to collect edible plants or hunt very nimble game that brings a large supply of meat. The gameplay feature is the gene. The game allows you to experiment with DNA and pair a dominant gene with a recessive one, and then observe the result. Then find a new nest of other creatures and hatch completely new individuals.

item.title: Dead Age
item.description: Game Description Dead Age has an excellent and non-linear story, consisting of many choices that lead to 6 different endings. You will have to carefully study the text of the tasks, otherwise the members of your squad of survivors will inexorably dwindle. The point of the game is to survive as many days as possible, replenishing food supplies, tools and new survivors. But don’t think that everything is so simple, in addition to collecting, the game has daily events that will fill your every new day in the game with various difficulties or opportunities.

item.title: Dead by Daylight
item.description: Game Description Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical cooperative horror game inspired by youth slashers. The story centers on four survivors facing off against a fifth player who controls a bloodthirsty maniac. The defending team’s job is to do everything possible to ensure they aren’t dead by dawn. Finding yourself in the same location with the killer, you need to use the environment and interact with your partners, trying to resist the monster.

item.title: Hearts of Iron 4
item.description: Game Description Despite the fact thatHearts of Iron 4 is famous for its realism, the new part has completely redesigned the focus tree for individual countries and nationalities. The strategy, dedicated to the Second World War, invites you to play in countries such as Italy, Ethiopia, Spain, Japan and China. Two scenarios that differ in their dates: 1936 and 1939. In one of them you will take part in the Second Italo-Ethiopian War and the Spanish Civil War, and in the second you will see how Japan invaded China, and the Second World War was fought.

item.title: Stellaris
item.description: Game Description Real-time strategy -Stellaris - immerses us in outer space, where we become kings of the galaxy from the very first minutes. The gameplay surrounds you with a huge number of ships and their types. For example, merchant spaceships will travel between different planets and sell/buy resources, reconnaissance ships will be able to explore new distances, and construction ships will help occupy - for friendly purposes - a new planet and recreate an entire empire on it.

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is a survival simulator in an unknown world, where our character, pre-selected in the editor, wakes up and immediately goes to look for firewood, because Maxwell said so. The game is cooperative, since the story passage is divided into 2 parts. The first is survival. It is built on three phases of the day: day, evening and night. During the day, your character calmly survives, collects items, crafts new ones, eats and carries out orders for Maxwell.

item.title: XCOM 2
item.description: Game Description Twenty years ago, people signed an act of complete surrender of the earth to the aliens. Another civilization has shown that there is no hope for salvation, and therefore alien invaders have taken over the entire planet. At the beginning ofXCOM 2 we are shown a video from the current ruler of the planet (in fact, this is a staged, drawn character, he is controlled by aliens), who says that today is the day when the aliens captured us, and the earth plunged into peace; Today we celebrate 20 years of freedom.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Turn-based strategy with a side view -Darkest Dungeon - developed in a dark style and with rogue-like elements. A huge number of characters will not let you calm down until everyone on the playing field creates the perfect combination for victory. Each battle with opponents is a fascinating tactical adventure, where victory is 80% knowledge of the game and 20% knowledge of logic. Your characters are ordinary people with extraordinary health.

item.title: The Isle
item.description: Game Description The island on whichThe Isle takes place has a rich and varied environment that is randomly generated. All artifacts, items and events will be located in different places with each new launch. Players must team up to effectively explore the area, which contains many secrets, including various quest items that further advance the plot. The map contains an area of ​​16x16 square kilometers. Multiplayer survival game The Isle allows you to play with three different factions in three different modes:

item.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
item.description: Game Description A new installment in the first-person shooter,Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege is a game of multiplayer destruction. We will not just destroy the map to which we and our friends were sent, but we will build traps, plant a bomb, and all this at a distance of a bow shot. The technical equipment of the new part is made specifically so that you can blow up everything in the open location of each level.

item.title: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes
item.description: Game Description Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes is a cooperative sapper simulator. You are locked up with your friends. No one knows where the explosives are, but instructions are issued on how to disarm them. They must verbally explain what elements the bomb consists of and ensure that the player, acting as a sapper, can defuse it. Each round will be quite intense. Everything depends only on the correct and competent relationship between the participants.

item.title: Batman: Arkham Knight
item.description: Game Description InBatman: Arkham Knight - a third-person action game, we eliminate this problem, and the Scarecrow himself too. After the events of the last part of Batman, Gotham City finally has a normal, friendly environment. Fights, robberies and murders continue, but if the protagonist does not hear about them, it means that everything is covered up by the police, or these are just rumors. Suddenly the Scarecrow appears and says that during the last incident he only used 100 grams of his drug.

item.title: Kerbal Space Program
item.description: Game Description In the space simulatorKerbal Space Program the player will lead the Kerbal race exploring the vastness of space. Be the one who guides them towards a brighter future, inventing new technologies, constructing many new mechanisms and helping in the exploration of the galaxy. Start your journey in one of three modes. In “Career” you will need to monitor the education and training of your charges, as well as help in modernizing their devices.

item.title: Elite Dangerous
item.description: Game Description Elite Dangerous is an online multiplayer game, the third part of the “Elite” franchise, which began in 1984. The player is given complete freedom to explore and travel, and has the opportunity to influence the storyline. The action takes place thousands of years later in the distant future on the territory of several million star galaxies. Most of the stars, planets, asteroids and other cosmic bodies that exist in the real world.

item.title: Cities: Skylines
item.description: Game Description The city-planning simulator -Cities: Skylines - is in the best traditions of the real game, in which its own physical laws were created to transfer them into gaming reality. On the territory of your new city, it will be taken into account that the profile road is built in one way, and the road at the airport - in another. It will count if you correctly lay the pipeline for the heating system, and also if you can show people that they live in a real paradise, and not just a metropolis where they want to buy them at the expense of shopping centers.

item.title: Geometry Dash
item.description: Game Description Geometry Dash is a 2D arcade game aimed at hardcore level completion. You will take control of a unique character, which can be in the form of a geometric figure, to pass the most difficult levels and open up new opportunities in the gameplay. Here you will find more than 100 original and challenging missions, as well as the opportunity to create your own main character and share your results on the leaderboard.

item.title: This War of Mine
item.description: Game Description This War of Mine is a cross-platform platformer game with elements of survival for an entire group of people. At the beginning of the game, you are given several characters to control the group, and you develop them depending on the time of day. During the day, the characters live in a house located in a city besieged by rebels. They arrange their everyday life, help each other, perform joint tasks and craft the necessary items.

item.title: Insurgency
item.description: Game Description Insurgency is a first-person shooter, in which the developers focused on playing in cooperative or multiplayer mode, about the Iraq War. The protagonist is a member of the US PMC, and he is fighting against Iraqi insurgents. The player chooses one side at the beginning of the match, and after that a brutal fight begins between the two factions. The basis of the game is a confrontation between two teams, which include 16 people.

item.title: Kingdom Rush
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Rush is a project in the “tower defense” genre, in the style of the Middle Ages, interspersed with magic, creatures that do not exist in real life, like trolls, and real-time control of heroes with a choice of the direction and course of their attacks. This game received recognition on many platforms and later reached personal computers. The gameplay is standard for the genre, the advantage over other projects is the refined balance and exciting, moderately difficult levels that challenge and force you to change battle tactics and constantly be on the alert.

item.title: Arma 3
item.description: Game Description InArma 3 we regain our independence by playing as a neutral side of this war. Inside the universe of the third Arma - 2030. Key opponents are still fighting for independence in economic and commodity terms. Among the enemies, a new structural organization CSAT appears, acting as a military-political alliance. While the crisis rages in Europe, the United States is at odds with China in the Pacific. More than 400 square kilometers of gaming space, where the player, playing the role of a NATO peacekeeper, will save his group from real traitors who show themselves at the beginning of the story campaign.

item.title: Total War: ROME 2 - Emperor Edition
item.description: Game Description InTotal War: ROME 2 - Emperor Edition we are allowed to play as one of Caesar’s three followers. This is Octavian, the adopted son of a former ruler who is obliged to become the ruler of Rome; Mark Antony is Caesar’s loyal friend and best military leader; and Lepidus, the man through whom Caesar achieved universal recognition. After Caesar was killed, chaos erupted within the Roman Empire. The foreign policy of the empire maintained proper balance, while civil war was taking place inside, and the territory was divided into three parts.

item.title: Europa Universalis 4
item.description: Game Description A new part of the real-time strategyEuropa Universalis 4, the multiplayer mode of which allows up to 32 people to play on one server. Based on the previous parts, we can say that there are no more spies in the game, since they upset the overall balance of the game. The magistrate system has also changed greatly as the city’s development has undergone significant changes. The trading system has improved the most.

item.title: Papers, Please
item.description: Game Description The fictional country of Arstotzka is a small world of the game’s protagonist, where he will check documents at customs every day. The plot ofPapers, Please - a puzzle game with an unusual approach and graphics, as well as the beginning of the simulator - shows the events with the main character winning the profession of a customs officer at a checkpoint in the lottery. His task will be to check documents and apply stamps.

item.title: Company of Heroes 2
item.description: Game Description The events ofCompany of Heroes 2 unfold before us in snowy Norilsk, where one of the largest Stalinist Gulags is located. NKVD officer Churkin comes here, who understands that he will not survive the next Stalinist purge of officers. In the Gulag he finds his comrade from the front, who is serving his sentence and preparing to be shot. Isakovich is the name of the character, he wrote a tome with the real actions of the commanders of the Red Army, for which he was sentenced to death.

item.title: Gunpoint
item.description: Game Description Gunpoint takes the user to the near future, where many interesting spy things have been invented. Richard Conway works as a spy for hire, performing a variety of tasks. One day he gets a special copy - hyperpants. This item of clothing helps you jump over huge distances, and also help you fall from a height without harm to your health. The protagonist receives a new task - to investigate the murder of an employee of a weapons company.

item.title: Age of Empires 2
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2 is a re-release of the classic real-time strategy game with many different improvements. Many years later, this game still remains unique and serves as an example for many strategy developers to follow. In the game, the player will have to take control of a small settlement of a certain faction and lead it to victory and prosperity. Events take place in the Middle Ages, roughly starting from the fall of the Roman Empire and up to the Renaissance.

item.title: FTL: Faster Than Light
item.description: Game Description FTL: Faster Than Light - this project is a two-dimensional simulator of a space combat ship. The creation and publication of this media product was carried out by the Subset Games studio. The official release took place in the first half of autumn 2012. The gameplay is based on the interaction between the player and the crew of the combat starship. The success of this space tactical strategy will depend on how successful this cooperation is.

item.title: Dungeon Defenders
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Defenders is an interesting game that combines a huge number of different genres: action, strategy, role-playing, RPG. This game is initially designed for multiplayer connections. Before we start, we have to choose the most interesting character class, his equipment style and the color of the magic crystal. This item is the most vital for the hero; if its structure is disrupted, the character’s death may occur. There are many different types of improvements in the game: hero characteristics, crystals and passive abilities, and most importantly, basic combat spells.

item.title: Sid Meier's Civilization 5
item.description: Game Description Sid Meier’s Civilization V is a strategy game with an RTS style, where we still build a civilization from primitive times to the present. You can choose from 18 strong powers of this world, within which you can add 7 wonders of the world, put in control a leader who has individual characteristics, and also does everything in his own way. The legendary turn-based strategy series introduces us to the sequel, in which a huge number of additional areas have been added.

item.title: Mount and Blade: Warband
item.description: Game Description Mount & Blade: Warband is a standalone add-on that brings many improvements and innovations to the game. New textures, object and character models, as well as sophisticated visualization settings. Change FSAA anti-aliasing, tone mapping and other effects in the settings. Modernized animations, improved combat system and the spirit of the heroes. People will flee if they are in imminent danger or, conversely, fight to the last if their morality is high.

item.title: Plants vs. Zombies GOTY Edition
item.description: Game Description Plants vs. Zombies became the game of the year, winning in many categories. The developers invite us to once again plunge into battles in a small location in order to free ourselves from the shackles of various zombies, hold back all the ardor of the monsters and save the city by using the latest technologies in the agricultural industry. Among the primary weapons in strategy, we have a pea shooter, a cherry bomb and sunflowers, which we use to earn money to purchase new strategic weapons.

item.title: STAR WARS Empire at War - Gold Pack
item.description: Game Description STAR WARS Empire at War - Gold Pack is a collection of real-time strategies based on the Star Wars plot. You will play the role of an army manager on one of the sides in an intergalactic civil war. Command units of the Empire, Rebels, Republic or other civilizations. In Star Wars Empire at War, you will command your team, completing tasks and freeing planets from enemies. Visit Tatooine, Kashyyyk, Dagobah or other hot spots in the galaxy.

item.title: Counter-Strike: Source
item.description: Game Description Emerging as a worthy competitor to its previous installment,Counter-Strike: Source is an updated version 1.6 in which players found both disadvantages and advantages. For example, in the new part, many weapons have a completely different bullet spread, which is why players had to get used to it for a long time. The ballistics and shooting technique have not changed, but the graphics and the “atmosphere of an open location” added additional charm to the game for fans of the first-person shooter.

item.title: Stronghold Crusader HD
item.description: Game Description A real-time strategy with an in-depth system for leveling up your settlement -Stronghold Crusader HD - was released with an addition that allows you to display the picture on a large screen with good quality. The basis of the game remains the same: we develop, build a large army, attack the enemy, whoever he is, win and move on. **The game has 4 historical campaigns, which are divided into stages in history.

item.title: Counter-Strike
item.description: Game Description Counter-strike is a legendary multiplayer shooter, the founder of one of the most popular series in the history of the gaming industry. The concept is simple but ingenious. Two teams - terrorists and special forces - are trying to destroy each other on the map. Terrorists have the ability to plant a bomb at one of the key points. and the counterterrorism department tries to predict which point the opponents will attack.

item.title: AGRONOM
item.description: Game Description AGRONOM sends players to 22nd century Mars to build a working estate. You arrive on a specific piece of Martian land with a specific task. This mission involves creating a living space designed to fulfill the wishes of Grandfather Makar and dedicated to the memory of his late wife Sofia. The idea extends beyond the simple construction of buildings, seeking to recreate the atmosphere symbolized by pancakes with plum jam, pickled cucumbers and home-made moonshine.

item.title: Alchemist's Alcove
item.description: Game Description Alchemist’s Alcove takes the player on a journey through ancient lands, collecting components from defeated enemies to create spells, tools and weapons. The process of battle and discovery is central to the gameplay, and the remains of opponents become the basis for a growing arsenal. Heroes navigate the territories of warring factions using a grid-based map, pursuing the ultimate goal of creating the Philosopher’s Stone through turn-based combat and exploration of the world.

item.title: Cultist Simulator
item.description: Game Description Cultist Simulator is a role-playing card game that allows you to create your own unique card deck. The plot tells us about a magical world, in which they give the opportunity to find out all the mysterious and mysterious events that happened in the real world. You can go fight witches, find Masons and go in search of other adventures. At the very beginning, gamers have the opportunity to choose starting cards, and then start completing missions and exploring a huge text world.
